mainEntity.name: What courses does Aviators Training Centre offer?

acceptedAnswer.text: Aviators Training Centre offers comprehensive DGCA Ground School for CPL/ATPL exams, RTR(A) preparation, Type Rating preparation for A320 & B737, one-on-one online classes, and interview preparation for airline jobs.

mainEntity.name: Are your instructors experienced in the aviation industry?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, our instructors are experienced airline professionals with real-world experience in major airlines. They bring practical insights and industry knowledge to help students succeed in exams and interviews.

mainEntity.name: How can I enroll in your courses?

acceptedAnswer.text: You can enroll by visiting our contact page and filling out the enrollment form. Alternatively, you can book a demo session to experience our teaching methodology before committing to a full course.
Yes, we offer flexible online classes for all our courses. Our online platform allows you to study at your own pace with 24/7 doubt support from our expert faculty.

mainEntity.name: What is your success rate for DGCA exams?

acceptedAnswer.text: We maintain a high success rate for DGCA exams through our structured curriculum, thorough mock tests, and personalized attention. Our methodology focuses on conceptual clarity and practical application of knowledge.
